en: This will open a new page in a browser
You gain permanent stats based on the number of Sequences you've completed
I am 4DM1N-D2 and I will be your training coordinator
First, let's test your basic motor functions
In a moment, I will create a target - destroy it
Press W, A, S, D to move around, mouse to aim, and left-click to fire your gun
Hm, guess that doesn't work. Try matching colors with the target
Use 1, 2, and 3 or scroll wheel to change your color
That worked. Next, let's calibrate your optic algorithm
See those hexagons above your head? Together they're called a Sequence
Destroy targets that match the color of each hexagon from left to right to complete the Sequence
For every Sequence you complete, you get closer to unlocking your evolutionary potential
Try to complete a Sequence by destroying this target
Too bad, you failed to complete the Sequence because the target was the wrong color
If the Sequence doesn't match the color of the targets, you can refresh it by pressing R. Give it try
Looks like you've got the hang of it now
Not quite, give it another try. Press R to refresh the Sequence
Targets change to a different color after taking damage
Seems like your optic recognition is working well, let's make those targets a little more dynamic...
Enemies heal when hit by a different color
Interesting, what if the targets had photon receptors...
Keep up the pace, the targets are going to be more aggressive from here on out...
After failing your Sequence, it takes longer to refresh
Let's slow your Sequence recovery and see how you do...
When you're hit, you fail your current Sequence
Impressive! One final test. Physical trauma now disrupts your current Sequence...
After completing a Sequence, your bullets temporarily slow targets
Looks like you've made your first evolutionary adaptation
After completing a Sequence, you temporarily move faster
Another adaptation! This should improve your agility
After completing 4 Sequences, stun all targets
Fascinating, this adaptation disrupts nearby electronics
After completing 3 Sequences, your firepower temporarily increases
Looks like you've reached your ultimate evolution
